Erskine Sanford https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erskine_Sanford 0 Erskine Sanford (November 19, 1885 – July 7, 1969) was an American actor on the stage and in radio and motion pictures. A member of Orson Welles's Mercury Theatre company, he also appeared in several of Welles's films, most notably as the bumbling, perspiring newspaper editor Herbert Carter in Citizen Kane. Erskine_Sanford ( November_19 , 1885 – July_7_,_1969 ) was an_American_actor on the_stage and in radio_and_motion_pictures . A_member of Orson_Welles 's_Mercury_Theatre_company , he also appeared in several of Welles 's_films , most_notably as the_bumbling_,_perspiring_newspaper_editor_Herbert_Carter in Citizen_Kane .
